alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 2:58PM MST until January 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches at lower elevations and 2 to 5 inches at higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern Twin Falls County, Southwest Highlands and Camas Prairie zones. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
